summary: High school student Ling Xiaoyu is recruited by Anna Williams of G Corporation to transfer to Kyoto University and gather information on a student named Shin Kamiya.
cast: Isshin Chiba|Unshô Ishizuka|Yuki Matsuoka|Mamoru Miyano|Ryôtarô Okiayu|Maaya Sakamoto|Masanori Shinohara|Hidenari Ugaki|Akeno Watanabe|Christine Marie Cabanos|Kyle Hebert|Carrie Keranen|Erik Scott Kimerer|Mary Elizabeth McGlynn|Amanda Céline Miller|Tara Platt|Jamieson Price|Patrick Seitz|Kaiji Tang|Cristina Valenzuela|David Vincent|Jason Wishnov|Ginny You
title: Tekken: Buraddo benjensu
